煫字的基本解释

煫
suì
古同“燧”。

煫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suì］
［《廣韻》徐醉切，去至，邪。］
亦作“煫1”。
(1)古代取火用具。火镜，一种青铜凹面镜，用以向日取火。
(2)古代取火用具。木燧，按季节用不同的木料制成，钻以取火。
(3)犹钻。参见“燧木”。
(4)古代边防夜间报警的火炬。与白昼使用的“烽”相对。
(5)后亦泛称边境报警的烽火，不分昼夜。
(6)烽火台。
(7)指边城。
(8)火炬；火。
(9)焚烧；点燃。
(10)燧人氏的简称。

煫字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　煫； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页678第06
【篇海】同燧。詳燧字註。

煫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
煫字的起名意思

暂无。

煫
Basic explanation of words
煫
suì
Gu Tong "sui".
煫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suì］
["Guang Yun" Xu Zui cut, go to the end, evil. ]
Also known as "煫1".
(1) Ancient fire appliances. Fire mirror, a bronze concave mirror, used to make fire to the sun.
(2) Ancient fire appliances. Musui, made of different wood materials according to the season, is drilled to make fire.
(3) Still drilling. See "Flintwood".
(4) The torch for the ancient border defense at night. Contrast with the "Feng" used in daylight.
(5) Later, it is also generally called the beacon of the border alarm, which is day and night.
(6) Beacon Tower.
(7) Refers to the border town.
(8) Torch; fire.
(9) Incinerate; ignite.
(10) The abbreviation of Suiren.
煫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　煫; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 678 06
